title: The Cervelo Rouvida Is the Company’s First E-bike. Wait, What?
content:
Cervelo assures us the sky isn't falling and that their first e-road and e-gravel bike is every bit a Cervelo.

Read the full article at The Cervelo Rouvida Is the Company’s First E-bike. Wait, What? on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
